verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Bwana moyo wangu,
hauna kiburi nayo macho
yangu hayainuki). x2
(Wala sijishughulishi
na mambo makuu yanayozishinda
nguvu zangu). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hakika nimetuliza
nafsi yangu
na pia kuinyamazisha.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kama mtoto
aliyeachishwa ziwa,
kifuani mwa mama yake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ili Roho yangu
ilivyo kwangu mimi,
tangu leo na milele.
